name: part_009
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】ReGLOSS 1st Live ＂Flashpoint＂【有明アリーナ】 [wlPLYUOmtHE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: MC section with Ichijou Ririka addressing the viewers.
Otonose Kanade and Hiodoshi Ao join in for the MC section.
Instrumental transition and costume change introduction for the next song.

subtitles.original: めっちゃ早いんだけど、無料チラ見せパート
subtitles.english: It's so fast, but the free preview part...

subtitles.original: なんとですね、次の曲までとなっております！
subtitles.english: ...is actually up to the next song!

subtitles.original: まだまだ一緒に盛り上がりたいみんなは
subtitles.english: For those who want to keep getting excited together...

subtitles.original: 概要欄のリンクから見てください！
subtitles.english: ...please check the link in the description!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: みんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: ライブはね、まだまだ
subtitles.english: The live concert...

subtitles.original: 始まったばかりでちゅよ！
subtitles.english: ...has only just begun!

subtitles.original: 最後までね、一緒に
subtitles.english: Let's make the best time together...

subtitles.original: 最高な時間をちゅくろ！
subtitles.english: ...until the end!

subtitles.original: おー！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Snowfall 触れる直感 空想と過ちのノイズを鳴らす
subtitles.english: Snowfall, a fleeting intuition, sounding the noise of fantasy and error

subtitles.original: Slowmo かじかむ衝動 おどけて見せる世界
subtitles.english: Slow-mo, a numbing impulse, a world shown in jest

subtitles.original: If the sky is falling down
subtitles.english: If the sky is falling down

subtitles.original: If the stars have no shine
subtitles.english: If the stars have no shine

subtitles.original: 真っさらな紙の上 答え滲ませ
subtitles.english: On a blank sheet of paper, the answer bleeds out

subtitles.original: 全て思うままに
subtitles.english: Exactly as I desire

subtitles.original: 風が刻む 涙のメロディ
subtitles.english: The wind carves a melody of tears

subtitles.original: パンドラパンドラ 夢を掘り舞い
subtitles.english: Pandora, Pandora, digging up and dancing with dreams

subtitles.original: 移ろい色褪せぬように
subtitles.english: So as not to fade and change

subtitles.original: パンドラパンドラ 秘密のオブジェ
subtitles.english: Pandora, Pandora, an object of secrets

subtitles.original: Scarab 嗚呼 パンパンパンパンパン
subtitles.english: Scarab, ah, pan-pan-pan-pan-pan

subtitles.original: Scarab 嗚呼 パンパンパンパンパン
subtitles.english: Scarab, ah, pan-pan-pan-pan-pan

subtitles.original: Scarab 嗚呼 パンパンパンパンパン
subtitles.english: Scarab, ah, pan-pan-pan-pan-pan

subtitles.original: 灯す火が サイレンスプラウト
subtitles.english: The lighting fire, Silent Sprout

subtitles.original: Scarab
subtitles.english: Scarab

subtitles.original: 1クールのドラマよりも長いフェアリーテイル
subtitles.english: A fairy tale longer than a one-season drama

subtitles.original: 嘘偽りなく Take this pain 殺風景なプラスチックマインド
subtitles.english: Truthfully, take this pain, a bleak plastic mind

subtitles.original: この世に表も裏もない
subtitles.english: In this world, there is no front or back

subtitles.original: いつも違う表情 朧げなアイロニー
subtitles.english: Always a different expression, a hazy irony

subtitles.original: 一日を抱きしめてたいのに
subtitles.english: Even though I want to embrace the day

subtitles.original: In the wall where no one's heart
subtitles.english: In the wall where no one's heart

subtitles.original: 曖昧の向こう Become kind
subtitles.english: Beyond the ambiguity, become kind

subtitles.original: 忍ばせて仮初め 朽ちるまで待ちぼうけ
subtitles.english: Keep it hidden temporarily, waiting until it rots

subtitles.original: いずれ花になれ
subtitles.english: Eventually, become a flower

subtitles.original: 風が刻む 涙のメロディ
subtitles.english: The wind carves a melody of tears

subtitles.original: パンドラパンドラ 夢を掘り舞い
subtitles.english: Pandora, Pandora, digging up and dancing with dreams

subtitles.original: 移ろい色褪せぬように
subtitles.english: So as not to fade and change

subtitles.original: パンドラパンドラ 秘密のオブジェ
subtitles.english: Pandora, Pandora, an object of secrets

subtitles.original: 可能性が スリリングインアファイト
subtitles.english: Possibility is thrilling in a fight

subtitles.original: 幾層にも重なって 停滞と歪みにアンビバレンス
subtitles.english: Layered many times over, ambivalence in stagnation and distortion

subtitles.original: 振り解いた 宿命向かい風
subtitles.english: Shaking off the headwind of fate

subtitles.original: Scarab 今こそ刹那の願い 打ち鳴らせ Wake Up!
subtitles.english: Scarab, now is the time for a fleeting wish, sound the alarm, Wake Up!

subtitles.original: そっと手を伸ばす
subtitles.english: Gently reaching out a hand

subtitles.original: 冬枯れの結晶
subtitles.english: Crystals of winter witheredness

subtitles.original: 閉ざしてしまいそうな夜だって
subtitles.english: Even on nights that seem to close in

subtitles.original: この歌声で繋ぎ止めてみせるから
subtitles.english: I'll show you I can hold it together with this voice

subtitles.english: The wind carves a melody of tears
